column4: I plugged in my USB headset, everything works fine but when I use the volume control on my headset..... it changes the Microphone volume rather than the SPeaker volume (since it's listed first in Gnome Volume Control)
Is there possibly a way to switch the order of items so that the hardware volume control changes "Speaker" volume rather than "Microphone"?
in gnome, choose it in system> Preferences> Sound> Devices> default mixer tracks
